description: AI-forward iPhones, sleeker Apple Watches and AirPods that double as hearing aids will go on sale soon, Apple says.
title: Apple reveals AI iPhones and AirPods that double as hearing aids

description: The new iPhone 16 is all about artificial intelligence. But the iPhone does an uncomfortable amount of making things up in tests of its pre-release software.
title: iPhone 16’s unfinished Apple Intelligence is useful except when it’s bonkers

description: Apple unveiled new Airpods at its September launch event that will feature hearing aid capabilities.
title: Apple unveils AirPods that can work as hearing aids

description: At a keynote at its headquarters in California, Apple will highlight its push into AI — and trot out plenty of new gadgets from the iPhone to Apple Watch.
title: Apple to unveil iPhone 16, new Watches and AirPods. Here’s what to expect.

description: A trial opens in federal court in Arlington, Va., on Google’s other big antitrust challenge, with the Justice Department alleging that the company’s control of the technology used in placing and monitoring ads online constitutes a monopoly. We plan to get a starter story up early in the morning and update it with developments in the courtroom.
title: News publishers in spotlight as another Google monopoly trial begins
